drg-attachment
**************


Description
===========

A DRG attachment serves as a link between a DRG and a network
resource. A DRG can be attached to a VCN, IPSec tunnel, remote peering
connection, or virtual circuit.

For more information, see Overview of the Networking Service.


Available Commands
==================

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* remove-export-route-distribution

* update
